title: Will Everything Work Out In Brooklyn?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth, and Spencer Hall debate if they think everything will work out in Brooklyn with KD and the Nets moving forward together, if Patrick Beverly and Russell Westbrook can coexist on the Lakers and if Patrick Mahomes cares that his former wide receivers keep chirping at him in the media.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): KD and the Nets are moving forward together and can Pat Bev and Westbrook coexist?
